item.title: About me
item.description: Hey all and welcome to my webpage! $~$ $~$ $~$ I am currently in the first year of my PhD at the University of Groningen. My research interests are: Computational Neuroscience Decoding cognitive operations from brain-related signals! Which cognitive operations enable language comprehension & production? Statistics In particular GLMMs, GAMMs & Hidden semi-Markov models!

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello and welcome on my page. This is me trying to work out how everything works. :)
